attributes.title: Just don’t get it
attributes.review: This app took so long just to download and once it was downloaded it made my phone slow and glitched if I’m being honest you should download this app in less you want a slow and glitched phone I actually had hope for this but i guess trump always lets me down

attributes.title: Horrible in every way..DONT WASTE YOUR TIME ON DOWNLOADING IT!!!
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible! It took forever to download but its not my phone because every other app downloads in a second this app took 3 hours to download and when It finally downloaded it was so slow when i was using it, it made my phone glitch so much...DON’T DOWNLOAD IT!!!

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review:
I wanted to keep up to date with my fellow republicans and further promote the brand. This app started texting me at all hours telling me to inject Clorox bleach into my veins using any syringes I may find. I did...and now I think I’m dying. 

I also think it corrupted my camera. I bring my phone into the bathroom when  I shower for music.  But when I get undressed...I can hear...Donald Trump breathing heavy and whispering that he can get away with it so don’t stop. 

I don’t know, I’m uncomfortable and I think this should be shared so others don’t experience it.

Thank you.

attributes.title: it made me sneeze😿
attributes.review: this app hurt my feelings by giving me the undeniable need to sneeze. i could not control the urge i needed to sneeze every time i looked at the ratchet man on the cover of the app. if you don’t know what he looks like, i’ll remind you.😅 short blonde mullet with a shwoosh in front 🍊 spray tan that looks so packed on and layered it is orange, but don’t worry there are goggle lines so you don’t miss out on his sexy eyes ✨😇🤤 but all of these issues aside, i hate it with all my heart because i have to sneeze. 😌🤝🗣😋😎 please delete it to save all the fellow sneezers like me from sneezing uncontrollably.💔💔👌🌱

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: This app is like the worse it doesn’t even give the right information and it took so long to download and it’s not my internet my internet is fast but this thing doesn’t even work for the people that want to download this app I recommend not to this app is useless 😡😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: terrible won’t make me delete the app
attributes.review: it took a day to download 😤. why make me wait so long...then when i was on the app it was running so slow. it also had 3 curse word in there! mak- ma- make amer- make america gre-. i’m sorry i can’t even say it. those words are haunting me till this day. how do i get rid of the words. ALSO IT WONT LET ME DELETE THE APP.

attributes.title: Possibly the worst app I’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: Definitely 0/10- would not recommend. Got various emails after downloading app regarding my credit card information?? As well as several calls from unknown numbers. My phone has been glitching all day. 🍊not impressed, very bad.

attributes.title: do NOT download
attributes.review: this is a terrible app, if i could rate it 0 stars i would. i’m over here trying to educate myself like everyone tells me too but i can’t cause it keeps glitching. there’s also WAYYY too many inappropriate ads bruv. i’m just trying to learn and then i get an ad for an inappropriate website NO THANK YOU.

attributes.title: The worst app ever!! dont download
attributes.review: this app took 5 weeks for me to download!! No app should take that long. And once I opened it glitches started happening and there were roaches, spiders, and snakes all over my screen. 😟😟Then one giant, saggy orange roach popped up and I got a heart attack and almost DIED. 🤢🤢 And now we have a 🍊 ROACH for president. 😱😭 DONT DOWNLOAD. (ps. my heart is permenatly attacked) #scaredforlife

attributes.title: This app was awful!!!
attributes.review: When I first got on this fat man that looked like the annoying orange 🍊in his late 90’s and I got so scared I threw my phone across my room and hit my pet caterpillar that I was planning on taking a walk later that day. But, thanks to that fat cheese curd on my screen, I killed my caterpillar so now we can’t go on walks anymore!
